snippet.title: Dross - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Get ready to take on hordes of alien bugs in Dross, an upcoming FPS Roguelike set in a derelict facility. In Dross, travel to a procedurally generated world, get powerful weapons and equipment, and upgrade your gear to survive. Fight the Dross, discover and destroy the infestation, and uncover the secrets of this mysterious installation.
